ExtendedSection.Title: Enable the content type for edition and presentation

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
In order to allow editors dragging the example-formatter-configuration type onto a web page, proceed as follows:

  • with the Sitemap editor, create a new navigation level folder /sites/examples/formatter/ and define this navigation level folder to be a subsite
  • create a new page /sites/examples/formatter/basic/ with the sitemap editor
  • in order to activate your newly created formatter, open the sitemap configuration file under /sites/examples/formatter/.content/.config with the explorer and add the example-formatter-v1 resource type to the list of content elements

If you now navigate to http://localhost/formatter/basic/ and click on the wand icon, the example-formatter-v1 type should appear as an available resource type in the Add content dialog of the page editor.
